enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for sophomore, juniors, and seniors only.
title: DOHA SOCIOL 387-0-70 Advanced Topics Sociology

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course examines the process of globalization especially as it occurs in countries with emerging economies. Discussion will focus on how global connectivity is created and sustained by various institutions and practices including market economy, multinational organizations and ideologies of universalism.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value:
• Prerequisites: None

  • Open to sophomores and above

  • Open for Cross-Registration

subject: SOCIOL
